entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Brooks
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:34 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.7°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 03:13 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 03:13 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023
